name: Parting Gift to the Dead
text:
Break: Destroy target resonator in your field. Then destroy target resonator in your opponent's field.
Trigger During the end phaseof a turn in which a resonator you control has been destroyed. Pay B: Your opponent chooses a resonator in his or her field. That player may pay [Total cost of that resonator x200] life. If he or she doesn't, destroy that resonator.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
